originalText.text: It’s rare to feel good after going to the dentist! I had a very pleasant first patient experience, from checking in to checking out. Gloria did an amazing job! Had some stains on composite resin I had done and she made them look brand new. She was so thorough about what to anticipate for the X-rays and the cleaning. When I met Dr. Bhatt she was equally as thoughtful and clear about the best dental plan to proceed with. Glad I could find a reliable dentist in the city!

text.text: It’s rare to feel good after going to the dentist! I had a very pleasant first patient experience, from checking in to checking out. Gloria did an amazing job! originalText.text: The level of congenial and thorough personal care I receive from Advanced Dental Arts is top-notch across the spectrum, from the front desk staff, the assistants, the hygienists, and the dentists. Today I am writing about their hygienist Gloria, specifically. Gloria explains each move she makes during a deep cleaning, communicating concerns about pain levels (nonexistent for me) and clear advice for dental self-care. But more than that, she is a human being first, and shows her big heart just as much as her skill and talent in her job. Can't recommend her enough.

originalText.text:
Exceptional Teeth Cleaning Experience!

I recently had my teeth cleaned at Advance Dental Care and it was fantastic! The staff was friendly and welcoming, creating a positive atmosphere. The dental hygienist Gloria was highly skilled and made sure I was comfortable throughout the cleaning. The state-of-the-art equipment and thoroughness of the cleaning left me feeling refreshed. I appreciated the personalized oral hygiene tips provided. Overall, I highly recommend them for their exceptional service.

text.text:

originalText.text: As someone who doesn’t like the dentist, I had a wonderful and pleasant experience. It was my first time at Advanced Dental Arts NYC and I’d highly recommend them. The staff is very friendly and they walked me through every step of the exam and recommended helpful products to enhance my at home care. Happy that I finally found a great dental office so I can keep on top of my gum and dental health!

text.text: As someone who doesn’t like the dentist, I had a wonderful and pleasant experience. It was my first time at Advanced Dental Arts NYC and I’d highly recommend them. The staff is very friendly and they walked me through every step of the exam and recommended helpful products to enhance my at home care. originalText.text: I’ve been a patient at Advanced Dental Arts for over 10 years now. I’ve had regular teeth cleanings and have had to have a dental implant done. Dr Bertman and the whole staff are nice, professional, honest, caring and gentle with their care. They never push unnecessary treatments on me and explain everything well upfront for what I do need done. They have the latest tech for scans, x-rays, cleanings and molds. I recommend them to all of my friends and can’t recommend them enough to you.
